title: PolylineVolume
description: A polyline with a volume, defined as a 2D shape extruded along a polyline that conforms to the curvature of the globe.

show.description: Whether or not the volume is shown.

positions.description: The array of positions defining the center of the polyline volume.

shape.description: The array of positions defining the shape of the volume to be extruded.

cornerType.description: The style of the corners of the volume.

fill.description: Whether or not the volume is filled.

material.description: The material to use to fill the volume.

outline.description: Whether or not the volume is outlined.

outlineColor.description: The color of the volume outline.

outlineWidth.description: The width of the volume outline.

shadows.description: Whether or not the volume casts or receives shadows.

distanceDisplayCondition.description: The display condition specifying the distance from the camera at which this volume will be displayed.
